column4: i'm runing lubuntu 10.04 and my update manger is giving me an error that theres not enough free space on my hdd and to empty trash and get rid of temp packages from former installs useing sudo app get clean
how do i do that? i don't know what its asking me to do
you might also have quite a number of old kernels still installed..
open synaptic and search for "linux" you'll get a list of stuff. look for the old kernels and mark them for uninstall.
